text.text_translated:
I felt many things the person said were true.
I truly believe this is a big danger.
When we are more connected, we feel more separate.
This is not a big problem for people my age.
We lived without technology for a long time.
We know how to be alone.
We also know it is okay to be alone.
This is more important.
But young people under 20 are very different. They have a special problem.
These young people are always communicating.
They never feel alone.
They might not learn how to be happy alone. This is a risk.
They learn to talk with messages. They can change these messages. But this means they do not learn real conversation. They do not learn to talk to people face-to-face.
